Package com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem

Class FolderPruner

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.FolderPruner
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Operation, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable<com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
public class FolderPruner extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable<com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Duration>
Removes nested files matching matcher(Matcher) from the given folder when they meet expiration criteria.

Expiration Criteria

The maximum age of files can be set with maximumAge(Duration). Files will also be pruned (from oldest to newest) if disk space falls below minimumUsableDiskSpace(Percent) or when the folder's total size exceeds capacity(Bytes).

Lifecycle

  • isRunning()
  • start()
  • stop(Duration)
  • maximumStopTime()

Pruning Criteria

  • capacity()
  • capacity(Bytes)
  • matcher()
  • matcher(Matcher)
  • maximumAge(Duration)
  • minimumUsableDiskSpace(Percent)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
